subtitles:
52116 55552 [ Girl ] People once believed
that when someone dies...

55620 59920 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

63427 68694 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

71903 76897 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

131128 135656 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

135733 138998 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

142573 146532 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

148946 152177 Devil's fuckin' Night.
What's the count so far?

153684 156517 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

156587 161456 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

164428 167761 [ Man ] You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

167832 172633 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

172703 175001 - ls this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

175072 177939 - We found her, and you missed it.
- l don't care what her name is.

178009 180603 l didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

180678 184136 l can see why they took away
your gold shield.

184215 187241 Yeah, l wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

195459 199657 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

199730 201960 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

202033 205969 Look, l will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

218883 222910 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

222987 226252 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
232697 234927 You lied to her about Eric.

236667 240398 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

251849 257573 Now, come on.
Come on. lt's okay.

280029 284056 [ Sarah ] A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

284133 287034 l used to think that was true
about everything...

291574 295510 But now l know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

295578 299947 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

338185 341382 What are you,
like the night watchman?

362710 366077 You know, what this place
needs is a...

368582 372985 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

373053 376045 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
376123 378421 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
378492 381552 Hey, hey, let me do it.

381629 385656 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

385733 388167 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

388235 390169 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.

399980 403814 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

403884 407820 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

409757 413454 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?

413527 416758 - They make you fart big time.
- [ Chuckling ]

423070 425800 [ Man ] You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

425873 428501 from all the crap
floating around in it.

429677 433408 l wish l could have seen that.
[ Whistling ]

537317 541253 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

564211 567612 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

574855 577449 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

585499 588161 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.

588235 591534 - Mickey, call it in for me!
- [ Woman Shouting ]

707788 712384 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely.''
lt's pornography.

722402 725462 - [ Shelly ] No! Eric!
- [ Man ] See ya!

776047 778982 - Hey, that's good.
- [ Man ] That's good.

782854 786449 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

789794 794231 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

797902 799893 You go over there
and talk to your pals--

803141 806838 Are you out of
your motherfuckin' mind, man?

831636 835936 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

836007 839909 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

839978 843072 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
843148 845946 Fire it up! Fire it up!

849187 851178 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doin'?

886558 890050 - l love you.
- Say that again.

903808 907005 - [ Sarah ] Wow, you look great.
- [ Shelly ] Ta-da!

914052 916612 - Come here! [ Laughing ]
- No, no, no!
963401 966962 * lt doesn't matter how you hide *
967038 970371 * We find you if we're wanting to *

972744 976578 * So slide back down
and close your eyes *

976648 980846 * Sleep a while
you must be tired *

1017355 1021382 24k, huh? lt's 18k.
lt's crap. lt's probably fake.
1023861 1028389 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

1033071 1035733 l'll give you 50 bucks.
And l hate charities.

1035807 1038640 Now, you,
take it or leave it.

1047485 1050648 - You cheap ass, chrome dome...
- [ Siren Wailing ]

1053791 1056157 Close the gate
when you go out!

1056227 1058889 Oh, l close this up
for you real good, massa.

1061566 1065002 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1069707 1074167 Lucky l didn't stab
your fat ass.
1095066 1099833 * That point me to another day *

1179183 1182346 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?

1234647 1237309 l ain't murdered nobody, man!
l don't even fucking know you!

1237383 1241479 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- l want you to tell me a story.

1241554 1244955 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1245024 1247584 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1247660 1252529 l'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1252598 1257535 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.

1263209 1269011 Shelly, yeah, yeah. l shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1278257 1283160 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. lt's fun!

1283229 1287859 lt's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1292572 1295132 l'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1331444 1337314 * Sometimes it rains inside my head *

1345224 1349524 - Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
- lt's a mess.
1354734 1356827 * No, they don't have to take you *

1356903 1359667 l got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1359739 1364335 * No, they don't have
to take you away *

1364410 1367743 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1368848 1370782 Give me some of that
over there!

1373019 1376716 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1376789 1381556 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1381627 1385461 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? lt's tragic.

1385531 1389729 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1389802 1393863 - ls the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1436816 1441480 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.

1479258 1485390 * No, they don't have
to take you away **

1492038 1495201 [ Man ] Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!

1513793 1519322 - [ Clearing Throat ]
- l told you to stay out of here.

1519398 1523061 So l guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1523135 1527162 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1533079 1536071 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1541754 1545451 - ''Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.''
- [ Laughing ]
1560473 1562907 Who the fuck is this now?

1569949 1573783 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1581393 1585659 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1593305 1597674 ''Suddenly l heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1597743 1601679 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door.''

1608821 1612951 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1615361 1618353 l'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1650095 1655397 l repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1657036 1660494 lt was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1663209 1666872 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1674253 1677222 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1677289 1680349 l think you can rule out
accidental death.

1680426 1683224 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1683295 1687459 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1687533 1692266 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1692338 1694272 l'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1694340 1698106 Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

1699311 1701711 What the hell
do you call that?

1705451 1709217 l suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1709288 1712052 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1721769 1724397 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1724472 1727373 Okay, the rings!
l'll tell you about the rings!

1727441 1731844 They're in that metal box!
lt's under the shelf there!

1731913 1737442 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1741022 1743616 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1760474 1764706 Oh, it's beautiful.
l don't believe it.

1788569 1791504 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1794742 1797609 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1797678 1800306 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1800381 1802781 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1802850 1807947 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1814929 1817693 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1817765 1820427 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1822103 1825504 Each one of these is a life...

1834615 1838779 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1847428 1851626 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1853534 1857595 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1857671 1861300 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

1885766 1889224 lt's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

1896410 1900870 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1915763 1919699 l am the police and l say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1919767 1924932 And l say l'm dead and l move.

1928375 1932744 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1932813 1935941 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1937818 1941015 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1941088 1945081 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

1947895 1952491 l want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1952566 1957401 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1957471 1961931 - lt's gettin' too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1962009 1964443 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1964512 1969108 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1969183 1971777 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1971852 1975344 - [ Looter ] Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1975422 1980792 - [ Glass Shattering ]
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1980861 1984524 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1990304 1993705 - [ Woman Laughing ]
- [ Looter ] Leave it, run!

2003484 2006078 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

2006153 2008485 and you lose him
right out in the open.

2008556 2014392 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. l hate that.

2022770 2026001 Just wish l was a little
hungry again, that's all.

2026073 2030305 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, l may get it, l know.

2066513 2070472 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

2070551 2073782 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

2073854 2075617 l didn't have nothing
to do with that.

2078425 2081758 l got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

2081829 2084127 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

2084198 2088760 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

2088836 2091396 Gentlemen, by all means,
l think we ought to have...

2091472 2094669 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2097344 2099904 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2099980 2102778 - Whatever you say, l can do.
- Good.

2105719 2109746 l still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2109823 2114283 ls that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2114361 2116226 Call it my need to know.

2157571 2160870 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2164745 2169045 He was a buttface.
l could have made it.

2169116 2172176 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2176323 2181056 lt's more like surfing than skating.
l wish the rain would stop, just once.

2182229 2185721 - lt can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2202664 2207260 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2207335 2211669 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2215243 2219475 ''We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--''

2221683 2224550 Big ''kick me'' sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2224619 2228715 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2228790 2234695 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2234763 2238324 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2238400 2242393 - l know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- l bet he does.

2249411 2253142 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2255417 2260150 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

2296424 2300121 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2324986 2327614 - There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
- * No more **

2365927 2370455 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

2377339 2380365 lt's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2388283 2393118 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2395123 2400060 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2424652 2427382 Stop me if you heard this one.

2435797 2438561 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2442270 2444500 ''Can you put me up for the night?''

2450011 2454607 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

2456818 2460914 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2485146 2487114 l've got a gun
in my pocket.

2490151 2492881 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2526254 2530748 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2530825 2535592 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2546003 2550804 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2580571 2584234 lf l wanted ice,
l would have asked for ice!
2587678 2591045 Fill it up yourself, macho man.

2606397 2608991 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2609066 2611534 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2611602 2614537 This is a first.
Do l bow or do l curtsy?

2614605 2617403 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

2626317 2630014 - You stay put right there.
- [ Groaning ]

2672697 2678431 [ Man On Radio ] As you can see, l'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2678502 2681232 - [ Door Squeaking ]
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2681305 2684297 lt was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2684375 2687310 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2687378 2689539 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2689614 2691741 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2691816 2696583 ln fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2699657 2703149 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2709433 2713130 l saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2713204 2715468 You still have your hat on.
2731322 2735622 are you some kind of... ghost?

2745236 2749798 l don't know what l am. l need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2751809 2755870 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2755946 2759040 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2759116 2763712 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2766490 2770859 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2770928 2774125 Her body finally just gave it up.

2774198 2778066 l saw it.
l couldn't do jack for her.

2805963 2808056 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2808132 2813593 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2813671 2818404 l was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2818476 2821411 Give me something
l could work with.

2826283 2828774 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2828853 2832186 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2832256 2835714 would talk after
what happened to you?

2839096 2841758 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2847805 2852299 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2857181 2861174 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2861252 2864744 l used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2877468 2881928 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2886610 2889807 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2893450 2896146 l thought l'd use
your front door.

2899190 2905026 Look, man, l'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2916106 2919633 [ Gideon ] l got stabbed!
l shot the son of a bitch!

2919710 2922838 l watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2922913 2925973 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2926050 2929281 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2929353 2931878 l saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2931956 2936393 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2941565 2944033 - What else did you see?
- So far l haven't heard...

2944101 2946592 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2946670 2952199 What do l get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

2955112 2960209 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

2967491 2969925 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2969994 2971985 What're you tellin' me,
this thing is real?

2972062 2975725 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2975799 2979758 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2979837 2983967 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2986777 2991942 Eyes see. lt's one of the most important
things l learned from my sister.

2992016 2995281 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? [ Laughing ]

2998756 3001953 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

3002026 3004290 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

3004361 3007856 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

3007989 3011447 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3011526 3014927 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

3017299 3021065 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

3024306 3028970 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

3029044 3033413 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
3033482 3036178 l ain't makin' all this up.

3036251 3040779 l ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

3049331 3054359 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

3064613 3067605 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

3076925 3079223 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

3081963 3086832 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

3086902 3090838 l'll have the janitor
come on up.
3162510 3164444 * lt can't rain all the time *

3164512 3169040 [ Skipping ]
* Can't rain all the time *

3178126 3180822 [ T-bird ] l don't know how many times l
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
3180895 3183830 One part falls, it all falls!

3183898 3187356 - You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

3187435 3189995 That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fuckin' voodoo doll!

3195310 3199508 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

3251399 3254960 What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

3283231 3286496 - Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

3297545 3301982 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? l got it.

3303585 3306486 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

3306554 3309648 - This is business, right?
- [ Gun Cocks ] Faster.

3316865 3319265 l hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

3320869 3323838 - What in the crap--
- [ Tires Screech, Siren Wails ]

3330245 3332941 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3338520 3341512 This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

3347529 3350293 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

3369918 3372148 Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

3383231 3387497 - [ Engine Rattling ]
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

3400782 3404479 Oh, l hate this.
This ain't good.

3427609 3430840 But l don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

3430912 3433676 What are you talkin' about?
No, no, no, no, no.

3433748 3436842 You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, l remember her.

3436918 3439079 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3439153 3442418 She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

3442490 3446085 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

3446160 3449596 into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

3449664 3452929 lt's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

3453001 3457904 What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

3468917 3474116 l know you. l know you.
l knew l knew you.

3474188 3478279 l knew l knew you.
But you ain't you.

3478412 3482371 You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

3482450 3485886 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3485953 3488319 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3492927 3495896 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3506140 3509075 and felt how awful goodness is.''

3579046 3581344 [ Woman ] This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

3581415 3583747 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

3583818 3588187 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, ''Devil's Night''...

3588255 3591691 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3591759 3597129 Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

3597198 3602363 Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

3602436 3606065 The mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties--

3606140 3609940 Do you like them up or over?
l can't remember.

3611979 3614709 What are you doing?
l don't even like eggs.

3614782 3619719 - Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when l was five.

3619787 3623917 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3623991 3627324 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3627395 3632492 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

3638406 3643639 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

3646147 3650447 Oh, forget it. l never was
too good at this mommy shit.

3675109 3678044 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3678112 3681377 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

3681449 3685681 - We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

3687755 3689723 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3701869 3705396 l got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

3708809 3711243 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3711312 3715214 - You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

3715282 3717409 Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

3717485 3720352 who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3720421 3723390 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

3723457 3725391 and you're saying this is
just a fuckin' automobile accident?

3725459 3727757 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

3727828 3729853 l didn't want to interrupt you.
lt sounded good.
3729930 3731898 You gotta write that shit down.

3733968 3737028 The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

3737104 3741040 - Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

3744912 3748939 [ Dials Phone ]
Yeah, give me the lab.

3799667 3802261 [ Shelly ] One for sorrow,
two for joy...

3802336 3805169 - Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.
